msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
ASDoc update to indicate pop-up owners can not be a descendant. Remove FIXME.
SDK-31429 RTE and eventual app crashes when the owner of the callout is set to the first view navigator or its children
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fixes a bug in rev 22361 that left the sandboxRoot hidden from the screen reader after the last modal popUp was closed in a Marshall Plan scenario.
QE notes: Must be verified manually with a screen reader or other MSAA client.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix for SDK-30749 Modal popup do not behave in a modal fashion.

The fix prevents content underneath a modal pop-up from being voiced by a screen reader.  The fix also removes redundant code from AlertAccImpl that caused issues with Alerts launched by sub-applications under the Marshall Plan.
QE notes: Must be verified manually with a screen reader or other MSAA client.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Update getVisibleBoundsRect() to include soft keyboard height. Update PopUpManager.centerPopUp() to use visible bounds. Gate both with a compatibility version check.

QE notes: Please test with and without -compatibility-version=4.5. Tests should call centerPopUp for each soft keyboard activate event that is dispatched in order to get updated keyboard bounds due to word predictions.

Doc notes: Use compiler arg -compatibility-version=4.5 to revert to previous behavior: (1) PopUpManager.centerPopUp() uses the full screen size for centering and (2) SystemManager.getVisibleBoundsRect() returns full screen size in global coordinates and does not exclude soft keyboard bounds.
SDK-31254 PopUpManager.centerPopUp() should subtract soft keyboard height from visible height
Tests run: checkintests, mustella, mustella-air, mustella-mobile cyclones
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Gave StageTextAreaSkin the same default height as mobile TextAreaSkin
Fixed StageText-based skins to not send negative dimensions to StageText
Fixed popup visibility event dispatching and handling by StyleableStageText
Tests run: checkintests, mustella, mustella-AIR, mustella-mobile, mxunit
